views.markdown:
Requires Uber/Lyft from AppStre

Ability to get an Uber or Lyft to a specific location with the use of spotlight search.

Features:
- Set location nickname (uber)
- Set drop off location (uber/lyft)
- Set promo code (lyft)
- Set Lyft type (lyft)
- Set custom activation phrase for spotlight search (uber/lyft)

Default activation phrases:
- Uber get me home (uber get me home)
- Uber take me home (uber take me home)
- Lyft me up (lyft me up)
- Lyft me home (lyft me home)

Must have the respective applications from the AppStore!
Uber or Lyft

Configure options from Settings.
